TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_iga-semilaway_a_panan,2002, title = iga-semilaway_a_panan,2002, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/iga-semilaway_a_panan,2002} }

S.FORM: == iga-semilaway a panan,2002 == 藍色大門 , 2002 u sakamu nu Hulam "semilaway a panan"(Amilika:Blue Gate Crossing)2002 a mihcan, namitudud tina iga ni Yiceyan nu Taywan a tademaw. namaala 2002 a mihcan Kanchen iga a lisin "patuduay a lipay"patahkal, atu saka26 Hong Kong iga Cingsiang kawlah pangangan. matabesiw 5000 a mang kalisiw pacakay tu paya' i Taywan. caay kayadah mahiniay kapahay a iga i Taywan capi 2000 a mihcaan. siwkay nu iga <Sakizaya a belih>ci Mong-kerou atu ci Lin-yuecen u kaput nu malecaday a cacudadan. kasasukapah ku heni, mahiza ku calekakaan, yadah ku sakamuan. u lacul haca caay kaladaytu kami, 雖然我們不能在一起, caay sakamu caaytu kaidih tisuwanan. . (sapuelac nu Amilika: Just because we can't be together, doesn't mean I will stop loving you.) u namiasipay a tigami, liyad nu lacul sakamusa: 讀者來信,節錄如下: u micudaday i tabakiaya a cacudadan kaku, 我是一個大學生, naazih tu sulitan namu sa, izawtu ku sakauzip nu maku, maydih kaku pasimel cacay a kawaw nu maku, cayay henay pasubana' tu taw, haca taneng tuway masulul tu binawlan, , uyzasa, caay katineng kaku caay patahkal ku kamu i balucu'an. u homo kaku, 我是個同性戀, kunizateng kaku, amiliyas ku tademaw tu kaku namusakamu tuway sa, , amicumud tabakiaya a cacudadan, izawtu ku sakapahay a cabay kaku, , matineng ciniza, mangaleb manamuh cinizaan, , caay kaku matineng u homo ciniza, 是知道他不是同性戀, sisa, panutek kaku pacabay kapahtu. . caay katenes, simamidang tu ciniza, , kunizateng nu maku sa, kapahay a tademaw kya taw, , masitungus tu tina tatusaay, 他們兩個也很適合,

== iga-semilaway a panan,2002 == 藍色大門 , 2002 o sakamo no Holam "semilaway a panan"(Amilika:Bloe Gate Crossing)2002 a mihcan, namitodod tina iga ni Yiceyan no Taywan a tademaw. namaala 2002 a mihcan Kanchen iga a lisin "patodoay a lipay"patahkal, ato saka26 Hong Kong iga Cingsiang kawlah pangangan. matabesiw 5000 a mang kalisiw pacakay to paya' i Taywan. caay kayadah mahiniay kapahay a iga i Taywan capi 2000 a mihcaan. siwkay no iga <Sakizaya a belih>ci Mong-keroo ato ci Lin-yoecen o kapot no malecaday a cacodadan. kasasokapah ko heni, mahiza ko calekakaan, yadah ko sakamoan. o lacol haca caay kaladayto kami, 雖然我們不能在一起, caay sakamo caayto kaidih tisowanan. . (sapoelac no Amilika: Jost becaose we can't be together, doesn't mean I will stop loving yoo.) o namiasipay a tigami, liyad no lacol sakamosa: 讀者來信,節錄如下: o micodaday i tabakiaya a cacodadan kako, 我是一個大學生, naazih to solitan namo sa, izawto ko sakaozip no mako, maydih kako pasimel cacay a kawaw no mako, cayay henay pasobana' to taw, haca taneng toway masolol to binawlan, , oyzasa, caay katineng kako caay patahkal ko kamo i baloco'an. o homo kako, 我是個同性戀, konizateng kako, amiliyas ko tademaw to kako namosakamo toway sa, , amicomod tabakiaya a cacodadan, izawto ko sakapahay a cabay kako, , matineng ciniza, mangaleb manamoh cinizaan, , caay kako matineng o homo ciniza, 是知道他不是同性戀, sisa, panotek kako pacabay kapahto. . caay katenes, simamidang to ciniza, , konizateng no mako sa, kapahay a tademaw kya taw, , masitongos to tina tatosaay, 他們兩個也很適合,
